name: Blind and Thief
description:
Blind and Thief plunges you into an imaginary Louvre where you must steal one of the most famous paintings in history: the Mona Lisa. It's up to you to explore the museum, find clues, and avoid the guards that walk the halls.

Gameplay :

Controls : 

The game is played especially on PC with keyboard and mouse. To move, you just have to use the ZQSD keys and Ctrl to crouch.To launch use your scan, press F, and to launch a piece, use your Left Click. Use E to interact and steal paintings, and R to throw them.

Features : 

-Blind infiltration game
-Scan your environment
